title: Afghanistan Food Inflation
description: Cost of food in Afghanistan increased 17.59 percent in September of 2022 over the same month in the previous year. Food Inflation in Afghanistan averaged 7.96 percent from 2005 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 72.77 percent in May of 2008 and a record low of -27.46 percent in May of 2009. This page provides the latest reported value for - Afghanistan Food Inflation - plus previous releases, historical high and low, short-term forecast and long-term prediction, economic calendar, survey consensus and news.
author: Central Statistics Organization of Afghanistan
